learning_objectives.objective: Understand the fundamentals and architecture of Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative Pre-trained Transformers (GPT).
Gain insights into the pre-training and post-training processes of LLMs.
Explore the applications and current models of LLMs in real-world scenarios.
Learn about the specialized hardware and software used in training LLMs.
Develop skills in applying LLMs for Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks.
Analyze the ethical considerations and risks associated with LLM deployment.
Engage with practical examples and use cases in various sectors such as finance, education, and more.

target_audience.audience: AI enthusiasts, Data scientists, Machine learning engineers, and developers
Professionals in finance, education, and other sectors interested in applying AI solutions
Academics and researchers looking to understand the state-of-the-art in AI and NLP technologies

skill_level.requirements: Basic understanding of artificial intelligence, machine learning, and natural language processing concepts
